org.resthub.core.service.GenericService

  • Packages that use GenericService 
    Package Description
    org.resthub.core.service
    Provides generic service classes for CRUD operations.
    org.resthub.core.test.service
    Reusable classes for testing your generic services

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractServiceTest<T,ID extends Serializable,S extends GenericService<T,ID>>
      Service test base class in order to test your service extending GenericService This can be usefull to do a quick check that everything is fine for basic CRUD functionnalities.
